channel.title: [REQ] How can I make a menu command? [REQ]
channel.description:
Basically, I want to make a command which is called ::commands, and a list of commands appears on a menu that looks like your reading a clue scroll. Can anyone help me? I'm not sure If this is the appropriate section, but I could not find a "request" section on the forum, so I thought to ask here. Thanks for any help!
Oh, I also looked at one of the threads which shows you how to make commands, but it did not show how you can make a command in the one I am requesting help on. It only showed you, how you can make a command to give items and XP.

item.title: [REQ] How can I make a menu command? [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @_Kate1 ,Kate
item.description:
@_Kate1 wrote:

Ok, will try out and give notice! Thanks. Unfortunetly it failed, but now I know I can use this on 317’s! Thanks anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: [REQ] How can I make a menu command? [REQ]

item.title: [REQ] How can I make a menu command? [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I dunno anything about 508’s, but try something like this

if (cmd[0].equals("commands")) { p.frames.showInterface(p, 6968); p.frames.setString(p, "TEXT", 6968, 0); p.frames.setString(p, "TEXT", 6968, 1); }

Read full topic
